page.title: 08PRIVATE PROPERTY
page.content: The residential areas are pleasing to the eye because of the great variety in age and style of dwellings. The oldest houses are in Rottingdean itself with small flint cottages standing near grander residences. Privately owned properties dominate. Only a small area is council housing, some of these have also been sold to occupants. Saltdean's homes are modern. The overall impression is that Rottingdean is a highly desirable residential area for more affluent members of the middle classes, whereas Saltdean is more generally occupied by the lower-middle class.
